"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552988b36368726ce7080000#post_552988b36368726ce7080000
Its not a pleasant Feeling at all!

I was cutting my FIRST piece out and when I got to the last snip it literally Flew away the moment the snip was gone. 

And this is a Model Kit so if you lose any piece to this your Model is as good as _trash._

Thank god It was just far under my bed because I was about to be fucking depressed. This thing was $63!
